question: Which among the following is going to be the first state government to announce free and cashless insurance to the people?
explanation: The government of Maharashtra is going to be the first state government to announce free and cashless insurance to the people. They signed an MoU WITH General Insurance Public Sector Association. The government, semi-government employees and white ration cardholders will be covered under the scheme and it will also give special attention to the issue of overcharging of Private Hospital.
